description: Schedules a service software update for an Amazon ES domain.

parameters.name: DomainName
parameters.description: The name of the domain that you want to update to the latest service software.

nested_items.name: ServiceSoftwareOptions
nested_items.description: The current status of the Elasticsearch service software update.

nested_items.name: CurrentVersion
nested_items.description: The current service software version that is present on the domain.

nested_items.name: NewVersion
nested_items.description: The new service software version if one is available.

nested_items.name: UpdateAvailable
nested_items.description: True if you are able to update you service software version. False if you are not able to update your service software version.

nested_items.name: Cancellable
nested_items.description: True if you are able to cancel your service software version update. False if you are not able to cancel your service software version.

nested_items.name: UpdateStatus
nested_items.description: The status of your service software update. This field can take the following values: ELIGIBLE, PENDING_UPDATE, IN_PROGRESS, COMPLETED, and NOT_ELIGIBLE.

nested_items.name: AutomatedUpdateDate
nested_items.description: Timestamp, in Epoch time, until which you can manually request a service software update. After this date, we automatically update your service software.

nested_items.name: OptionalDeployment
nested_items.description: True if a service software is never automatically updated. False if a service software is automatically updated after AutomatedUpdateDate.
